definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to do sth once in a while (idiom)/to do sth more as an exception than the rule

sentences.english: Then there are "chippers, " who smoke occasionally but never seem to get hooked.
sentences.chinese: 也有吸菸者只是偶一爲之但從不上鉤。

definition: fleeting (of quick passage time)/in a flash/distracted manner/vacantly/frustratedly
at first/suddenly/abruptly/to spread/(of hair) to stand on end/bristling
(onom.) expressing admiration or surprise/sound of a laugh
phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
to exert flirtatious allure/to entice coquettishly
to be unable (to do sth)/no reason to .../without rhyme or reason
to delay/to stretch out/to play for time
